title: Huntington Shooting: 6 People Shot in West Virginia
content:
Six people were shot in a Huntington, West Virginia, housing complex on Tuesday night, local media reported.
WSAZ-TV reported that they were shot at the Northcott Court housing complex.
Five of the victims are being treated at local hospitals.
Authorities found a firearm and a magazine, but the suspect is at large.
The Charleston Gazette reported that three people walked into Cabell-Huntington Hospital with gunshot wounds.
Local police are investigating the matter.
Initial reports said they were shot at a gas station, but that is unconfirmed.
